alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 4:18AM CST until November 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, with storm total accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Iowa, Clayton County. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sidewalks and parking lots will also be slippery.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
